name: 又新印刷所旧址
name_en: The Former Site of Youxin Printing Press
address: 上海市黄浦区复兴中路221弄
description: 这里是第一个中文全译本《共产党宣言》的印刷地，见证了马克思主义思想的“理论到出版”的关键一步。
description_en: This is the site where the first full Chinese translation of "The Communist Manifesto" was printed, marking a key step from theory to publication for Marxist ideas.
